name: Super Metroid: Justin Bailey
overview: “JUSTIN BAILEY —— ——” was the infamous password that allowed you to play as Samus without her armor suit in the original Metroid, a reward normally reserved for those who can finish the game in under three hours. To the disappointment of many, an armorless version of Samus was not in the SNES sequel, Super Metroid. This patch, however, reimagines that missing feature — with every pixel being redrawn to make Samus playable once again without her suit.
